S04bsu040_u:1_0: namo buddhāya // tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmānupaliḥ pratisaṃlayanāta vyutthāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu040_u:1_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikāntaṃ nyasīdat /
S04bsu040_u:1_3: iha bhagavanmamaikākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīna cittasyāyamevaṃrupaścetasi cetaḥparivitarka udapādi /
S04bsu040_u:1_4: prātimokṣasaṃvaro bhagavatā prajñaptaścādhiśīlaśikṣā pariśuddhiḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānām ca /
S04bsu040_u:1_5: bodhisatvāyānikānāṃ tu bhagavatā jīvitaparityāge 'pi śikṣāpyatra parideśitā nirdiṣṭā /
S04bsu040_u:1_6: tat kathaṃ bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya tiṣṭhato vā śrāvakayānikānāṃ prātimokṣasaṃvaro vaktavyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:1_10: tasya me bhagavan vijñāpayatūpāyakauśalyaṃ samprakāśayatu bhagavan yathā bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sammukhaṃ śrutvā sammukhaṃ pratigṛhya vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ parṣatsu vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeyam /
S04bsu040_u:1_11: ayaṃ me bhagavannekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyaivaṃrupaścetasi cetaḥ parivitarka udapādi yattvahaṃ bhagavantamusaṃkramya vinayaviniścayaṃ paripṛccheyamiti /
S04bsu040_u:1_12: tat sādhu bhagavan vyākarotu tathāgato vinayaviniścayaṃ vistareṇa mahatī bhikṣuparṣata sannipatitā bodhisattvaparṣacca /
S04bsu040_u:2_1: tasmāttarhitvamupāle anyena prayogeṇānyenādhyāśayena śrāvakayānikānāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ vada /
S04bsu040_u:2_3: tat kasmāddhetoḥ / anyo hyupāle śrāvakayānikānāṃ prayogo 'nyo 'dhyāśayaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:2_5: tatropāleyā śrāvakayānikasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā mahāyānikasya bodhisattvasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
S04bsu040_u:2_6: yā mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
S04bsu040_u:2_7: tat kasmāddhetoḥ / ihopāle śrāvakayānikastatkṣaṇikacitte 'pi bhavopapattiṃ na parigṛṇhāti /
S04bsu040_u:2_8: iyaṃ śrāvakayānikasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā mahāyānikasya bodhisatvasyā pariśuddhaśīlata paramadauḥ śīlyañca /
S04bsu040_u:2_9: katamopāle mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā yā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśilyañca /
S04bsu040_u:2_10: ihopāle mahāyāne samprasthito bodhisattvo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān bhavopapattiṃ parigṛṇhāti aparikhinnacitto 'parikhinnamānasaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:2_11: iyaṃ mahāyānasamprasthitasya bodhisattvasya pariśuddhaśīlatā sā śrāvakayānikasyāpariśuddhaśīlatā paramadauḥśīlyañca /
S04bsu040_u:3_0: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle sānurakṣāṃ śikṣāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vada /
S04bsu040_u:4_0: kathaṃ copāle sānurakṣā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ niranurakṣā śikṣā śrāvaka yānikānām /
S04bsu040_u:4_1: ihopāle mahāyāna saṃprasthitena bodhisattvena parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ hitamanuvartitavyaṃ na punaḥ śrāvakayānikena /
S04bsu040_u:4_2: anenopāle paryyāyeṇa sānurakṣā śikṣā mahāyānikānām bodhisattvānāṃ niranurakṣā śikṣā śrāvakayānikānām /
S04bsu040_u:5_0: kathaṃ copāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasamprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ niḥ parihārāśikṣā śrāvakayānikānām /
S04bsu040_u:5_1: ihopāle mahānasaṃprasthitobodhisattvo 'pi saceta pūrvvāṇhasamaye āpattimāpadyeta madhyānhakāle sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:5_5: sacet sāyānhasamaey āpattimāpadyeta rātryāḥ purimayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:5_7: sacet rātryāḥ purimayāme āpattimāpadyeta rātryāśca madhyamayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:5_9: sacet rātryā madhyamayāme āpattimāpadyeta rātryāśca paścimayāme sarvvajñatācittenāvirahito viharedaparyyantaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:5_11: evaṃ hyupāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ /
S04bsu040_u:5_12: tatra bodhisattvena nātra kaukṛtyaparyyutthānamutpādyaṃ nātivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ /
S04bsu040_u:5_13: tatropāle sacecchrāvakayānikaḥ punaḥ punarāpattimāpadyeta naṣṭaḥ śrāvakayānikasya śīlaskandho veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:5_14: tat kasmāddhetoḥ / ādīpta śiraścailopamena hi śrāvakayānikena bhavitavyaṃ sarvakleśaprahāṇāya /
S04bsu040_u:5_15: evaṃ niḥparihārā śikṣā śrāvakayānikasya hyupāle parinirvvāṇakāmasya /
S04bsu040_u:6_0: katham copāle dūrānupraviṣṭā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvnāṃ sāvadānā śikṣā śrāvakayānikānāṃ /
S04bsu040_u:6_1: ihopāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍitvā ramitvā paricārayitvā bodhicittaṃ notsṛjati /
S04bsu040_u:6_3: tat kasmāddhetoḥ / bhaviṣyatyupāle sa kālaḥ sa samayo yanmahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvastenaiva bodhicittena suparigṛhītena svapnāntaragato 'pi sarvvakleśairnna saṃhariṣyate /
S04bsu040_u:6_4: api ca mahāyānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvena naikasminneva bhave sarvvakleśāḥ kṣapayitavyāḥ /
S04bsu040_u:6_6: paripakvakuśalamūlena ca śrāvakayānikenādīptaśi śacailopamena hi tatkṣaṇikokapi bhavopapattirnnotpāditavyā /
S04bsu040_u:6_7: evamupāle dūrānupraviṣṭā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sāvadānāṃ śikṣā śrāvakayānikānām /
S04bsu040_u:7_0: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle sānurakṣāṃ saparihārāṃ dūrānupraviṣṭāṃ śikṣāṃ mahāyānasamprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vada /
S04bsu040_u:7_1: niranurakṣāṃ niḥparihārām sāvadānāṃ śikṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ vada /
S04bsu040_u:7_2: tat kasmāddhetoḥ / mahāsaṃbhārā hyupāle 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirna sukarā ekāntaniviṣṭena mahāyānasaṃprasthitena bodhisattvenā prameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃdhārayituṃ saṃsarituma /
S04bsu040_u:7_3: idaṃ copāle 'rthavaśaṃ sampaśyan tathāgataḥ samyaksambuddho mahāyānāsaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvnāṃ naikāntanirvvedakathāṃ kathayati naikāntavirāgakathāṃ kathayati naikāntavirāgakathāṃ kathayati naikāntasaṃvegakathāṃkathaṃyati /
S04bsu040_u:7_4: api tu khalu punaḥ prītikathāṃ prāmodyakathām pratityasamutpādasamprayuktakathāṃ kathayati /
S04bsu040_u:7_8: ta imāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā 'bhiratāḥ saṃprāptā na parikhidyante bodhisambhārañca paripūrayanti /
S04bsu040_u:8_1: yā imā bhagavannāpattayaḥ kāścidrāgasaṃyuktāḥ kāścit dveṣāsaṃyuktāḥ kāścinmohasaṃyuktāḥ /
S04bsu040_u:8_2: tatra katamā bhagavan mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya gurutarā āpattayaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:8_3: kiṃ rāgasaṃprayuktā utāho dveṣasaṃprayuktāḥ utāho mohasaṃprayuktāḥ /
S04bsu040_u:8_5: sacedupāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā rāgasaṃprayuktā āpattīrāpadyeta yāñcaikāṃ dveṣasaṃprayuktāmāpattimāpadyeta bodhisattvayānaṃ pramāṇīkṛtyeya tābhyo gurutarā āpattiryeyam dveṣaprayuktā /
S04bsu040_u:8_6: tat kasmāddhetordveṣa upāle sattvaparityāgāya saṃvarttate rāgaḥ sattvasaṃgrahāya saṃvarttate iti /
S04bsu040_u:8_7: tatropāle yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvasaṃgrahāya saṃvarttate tatra bodhisattvasya na chalaṃ na bhayam /
S04bsu040_u:8_8: yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvaparityāgāya saṃvarttate tatra bodhisattvasya chalañca bhayañca /
S04bsu040_u:8_9: api tūpāle uktam pūrvvameva rāgo bandhavirāgo 'lpasāvadyo dveṣah kṣipravirāgo mahāsāvadyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:8_11: .............. bodhisattvasya / yaḥ kṣipravirāgo mahāsāvadyaḥ kleśaḥ sa bodhisattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi naiva yuktaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:8_12: tasmāttarhi tvamupāle bodhisattvānaṃ yāḥ kāścid rāgasaṃprayuktā āpattayaḥ sarvvāstā anāpattaya iti dhāraya /
S04bsu040_u:8_13: tatropāle ye 'nupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste rāgasaṃprayuktābhya āpatibhyo vibhyati na dveṣasamprayuktābhyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:8_14: ye punarupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo vibhyati na rāgasamprayuktābhyaḥ /
S04bsu040_u:8_15: atha khalu te tasyāmeva parṣadi mañjuśrīkumarabhūtaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt /
S04bsu040_u:8_20: ātyantavinītān sarvvadharmān jānīyustadapi na bhūyastathāgato vinayaḥ prajñāpyeta /
S04bsu040_u:8_21: sattvā na prīṇanti tasmāt tathāgato 'tyantavinītānāṃ sarvvadharmmānāṃ bodhāya vinayaṃ prajñāpayatyanupūrveṇeti yoniśamupādāya /
